hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Haunted Wasteland torches# reveal #a Piece of Heart#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Slingshot# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Deku Stick#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #Epona's Song#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #2 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Song of Time#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

ToT (Right).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

ToT (Right-Center).text: No matter what happens...Do not give up, do not complain, and do NOT stay up all night playing!

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
